original_title: This Isn't The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo It's A XXX Spoof
overview: Was it her beauty, her almost compulsive and voracious need for sex, or was it her tattoo? All they knew about her was that when she undressed in front of them, and showed off her incredible tattoo, she became a sexual animal driven mad by lust. And like a dragon, she devoured the men who thought they could tame her. She would drain every drop of jizz from their balls and leave them exhausted, but satisfied. Gotta love those tattoos!
title: This Isn't The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo It's A XXX Spoof
